title: Cyborg Nation
description: It was supposed to be a routine mission to collect a pediatrician for the offspring of the emerging cyborg nation. But rogue Cyborgs, Gideon, Jerico, and Gabriel realize fairly quickly that they have a unique opportunity to gain a mate/companion - Bronte. The rub is they weren't programmed for courtship. With no idea of how to woo the object of their desires, they fall back on the only skills they have to persuade her - their programming as pleasure bots.Rating: Contains graphic sex, graphic language, graphic violence, multiple partner sex.
author: Kaitlyn O'Connor
